install.title: Install
install.up_to_date: You have the latest Diagbox version available installed.
install.no_installed: No installation detected. Latest available online: {latest}
install.must_clean: A Diagbox version ({installed}) is already present. You must run Clean before installing.
install.must_clean_tooltip: Cannot install while Diagbox {installed} is present. Clean first.

clean.title: Clean Diagbox
clean.nothing_to_clean:
No Diagbox folders or shortcuts found to clean.

Folders checked:
- C:\APP
- C:\AWRoot
- C:\APPLIC

Shortcuts checked:
- Public Desktop shortcuts

vci_driver.title: Install VCI Driver
vci_driver.not_found:
VCI Driver installer not found.

Expected location:
{path}

Please install Diagbox first.
vci_driver.success_reboot: VCI Driver installed successfully. A reboot may be required to complete the installation.
vci_driver.warning:
VCI Driver installation returned code: {code}

The driver may already be installed or require a reboot.

launch.title: Launch Diagbox
launch.not_found:
Diagbox executable not found.

Expected location:
{path}

Please install Diagbox first.

kill_process.title: Kill/Close Process
kill_process.error:
Error while trying to kill processes:

{error}

language.title: Change Language
language.not_found:
Language file not found.

Expected location:
{path}

Please install Diagbox first.
language.success:
Language changed to {lang}

Please restart Diagbox for changes to take effect.

update.title: Update Available
update.no_asset: Could not find a downloadable .exe asset in the latest release.
update.no_updater: Updater helper not found. Update cannot proceed.
update.closing_app:
The application will now close to apply the update.

The updater will start automatically.
update.started: Update started. The application will now close so the updater can replace the executable.

requirements.title: Insufficient System Configuration
requirements.warning: Your system does not meet the minimum requirements:
requirements.low_storage: Insufficient disk space: {current} available on C: (minimum required: {minimum})
requirements.solution_ram: Add more RAM to your computer
requirements.solution_storage: Clean up C: drive by deleting unnecessary files, emptying recycle bin, or uninstalling programs
requirements.continue: Do you want to continue anyway?
